name: OCR Crawler - Burger Index
description: An OCR-based crawler that extracts images from mobile applications of various delivery platforms and retrieves relevant store, product, and attribute information.
role: Developed an OCR-template pipeline to extract relevant text from input images, applying template rules to map text information according to platform-specific configurations
Created pre-processing and post-processing rules to link and correct extracted data based on alternate data sources and existing records
Integrated a multi-modal LLM-based agent to verify and correct low-confidence OCR outputs, improving data accuracy and consistency
